description: {"blocks":[{"key":"35gie","text":"This protocol details the procedure of immunofluorescence assay (IFA).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"85dve","text":"Seed the HeLa cells onto HistoGrip (ThermoFisher) coated coverslips in growth media in 6 well plates (DMEM supplemented with 10 % (v/v) FBS, 1 % Penicillin-Streptomycin,   HEPES, GlutaMAX (Life Technologies) and non-essential amino acids (Life Technologies)).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":170,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8r1i7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"emq9h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"25","error_concentration":false,"guid":"D9E1A5A0081611EDAC46C9A345054CB8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":6}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"b2fcc","text":"After  , cells can be subjected to any required treatment prior to fixation.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"duration":172800,"guid":"F27B9B46081611ED90490A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"duration"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"86ocr","text":"Aspirate off the culture media and add   of fixation buffer to each well and incubate on a side-to-side shaker for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":115,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"700","error":false,"guid":"7D736270072D11EDBDC0DB3D4978EAEF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"847AB370072D11EDBDC0DB3D4978EAEF","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eodp5","text":"Aspirate off the fixation solution and wash three times with 1x PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dc9iv","text":"Permeabilise the cells with Permeabilization buffer (  for each well) for   on a side-to-side shaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":74,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"B406F130072D11EDBDC0DB3D4978EAEF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"B9F04F10072D11EDBDC0DB3D4978EAEF","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ddsgd","text":"Aspirate off the Permeabilization buffer and wash once with 1x PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ads2q","text":"Aspirate off PBS and incubate the cells with Blocking buffer (  for each well) for   on a side-to-side shaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":83,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"700","error":false,"guid":"E0813400072D11EDBDC0DB3D4978EAEF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"E4447D90072D11EDBDC0DB3D4978EAEF","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"frnt9","text":"Aspirate off the Blocking buffer, wash once with 1x PBS and once with permeabilization buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"43u3d","text":"Aspirate off the permeabilization completely and put the 6 well plates on a flat bench.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"96hi1","text":"Add the primary antibodies (diluted to the right concentrations in Blocking buffer;  /well) onto the glass coverslips and incubate for   -   depending on the strength of the antibodies.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":84,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":135,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":139,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"1602DD90072E11EDBDC0DB3D4978EAEF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"0E2E0360072E11EDBDC0DB3D4978EAEF","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"111E93A0072E11EDBDC0DB3D4978EAEF","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6kp3g","text":"Wash the coverslips twice with 1x PBS and once with permeabilization buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dodh4","text":"Aspirate off the permeabilization completely and put the 6 well plates on a flat bench.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8keti","text":"Add the relevant secondary antibodies (diluted in Blocking buffer to 1/200-1/500;  /well) onto the glass coverslips and incubate in the dark for   –  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":82,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":145,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":149,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"3C481380072E11EDBDC0DB3D4978EAEF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"32780590072E11EDBDC0DB3D4978EAEF","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"3674FCC0072E11EDBDC0DB3D4978EAEF","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ar52h","text":"Wash three times with 1x PBS and mount the coverslips on microscope slides.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9pcak","text":"Use a yellow tip, drop one small drop off mounting medium onto a microscope slide.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6duq7","text":"Pick out one coverslip from a well (still in 1x PBS) and place it onto a piece of whatman paper so that the side that the cells grew on is facing up.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eclu3","text":"Take the microscope slide with a drop of mounting medium and put it on the coverslip and gently push it down","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b6krq","text":"to remove excessive mounting medium.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ke6v","text":"Seal the edges with nail polish, let it dry and store in a microscope box at   prior to imaging.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":77,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"6AC6FFF0072E11EDBDC0DB3D4978EAEF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

title: Immunofluorescence assay (IFA)
